Pre-Game Insights: The Associated Press article mentions that Utah hosts Dallas following Irving's 43-point showing, indicating a notable performance by Kyrie Irving in the Mavericks' 122-120 loss to the Denver Nuggets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas plays the Utah Jazz after Kyrie Irving scored 43 points in the Mavericks' 122-120 loss to the Denver Nuggets.
Utah went 31-51 overall and 16-36 in Western Conference play a season ago.
Dallas went 50-32 overall and 31-21 in Western Conference games during the 2023-24 season.
Others: Injuries: Jazz: Walker Kessler: day to day (hip), Taylor Hendricks: out for season (fibula).
Mavericks: Dante Exum: out (wrist), P.J. Washington Jr.: day to day (knee).
